statements: SELECT * FROM meteorological_data;
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM meteorological_data WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT date, humidity, rainfall FROM meteorological_data WHERE humidity < 50 AND rainfall > 10;
SELECT id, wind_speed, hydropower_generation FROM meteorological_data ORDER BY wind_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM meteorological_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM meteorological_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM meteorological_data WHERE rainfall BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY rainfall DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT id, date, hydropower_generation FROM meteorological_data WHERE hydropower_generation > 1000 ORDER BY hydropower_generation DESC;
SELECT date, wind_speed, rainfall FROM meteorological_data WHERE wind_speed >= 10 AND rainfall > 0 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM meteorological_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY temperature ASC, humidity ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, actual_generation FROM HydropowerGeneration WHERE actual_generation > generation_capacity
SELECT date, generation_capacity, actual_generation FROM HydropowerGeneration ORDER BY generation_capacity ASC
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, generation_capacity, actual_generation FROM HydropowerGeneration WHERE actual_generation > generation_capacity * 0.8 ORDER BY actual_generation DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE date > '2022-01-01' AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY humidity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT date, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature = (SELECT MAX(temperature) FROM WeatherData) ORDER BY date
SELECT date, generation_capacity, actual_generation FROM HydropowerGeneration WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY date
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM WeatherData;
SELECT date, humidity, temperature FROM WeatherData;
SELECT precipitation, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData;
SELECT * FROM HydropowerGeneration;
SELECT date, water_level, generated_power FROM HydropowerGeneration;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY precipitation DESC;
SELECT date, generated_power FROM HydropowerGeneration WHERE generated_power > 1000 AND water_level < 50 ORDER BY date ASC;

SELECT w.date AS weather_date, h.date AS hydropower_date, w.temperature, h.generated_power FROM WeatherData w INNER JOIN HydropowerGeneration h ON w.id = h.id WHERE w.temperature > 25 AND h.generated_power > 1500 ORDER BY weather_date ASC, hydropower_date DESC;

SELECT w.id AS weather_id, h.id AS hydropower_id, w.temperature, h.water_level FROM WeatherData w JOIN WeatherHydropowerRelation wr ON w.id = wr.weather_id JOIN HydropowerGeneration h ON wr.hydropower_id = h.id WHERE w.temperature < 15 AND h.water_level > 60 ORDER BY weather_id, water_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM Weather_Data;
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM Weather_Data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT city, country FROM Location WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT MAX(generated_power) FROM Hydropower_Generation;
SELECT impact_description, analysis_date FROM Impact_Analysis WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT temperature, humidity, wind_speed FROM Weather_Data WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT city, country, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT generation_id, generated_power, recorded_at FROM Hydropower_Generation WHERE generated_power > 1000;
SELECT analysis_id, location_id, analysis_date FROM Impact_Analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Weather_Data JOIN Location ON Weather_Data.location_id = Location.location_id;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE wind_speed > 10;
SELECT id, power_output, water_level FROM hydropower_generation WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, location FROM weather_station WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM hydropower_plant WHERE capacity >= 100;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT MAX(power_output) AS max_power_output, MIN(power_output) AS min_power_output FROM hydropower_generation;
SELECT name, capacity FROM hydropower_plant WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, location FROM weather_station WHERE location LIKE 'North%';
